Welcome to the {{< fa brands r-project >}} training course! 

This course is aimed at first year PhD students in the Department of Statistics at the University of Warwick.

## Syllabus overview

-   Term 1: R Foundations, to cover the information and skills necessary to enable successful completion of the [APTS programme](https://warwick.ac.uk/fac/sci/statistics/apts/).

-   Term 2: Advanced R

-   Term 3: R package development

All slides and further resources can be accessed from the [content](content.qmd) page and also via the [schedule](schedule.qmd). Material will be added as the year progresses. There is one page per session.
